{"step_by_step_thinking": "The cut-off values for a 2-hour oral glucose tolerance test are defined by the World Health Organization. The fasting glucose level should be less than 92 mg/dL. One hour after the meal, the glucose level should not exceed 180 mg/dL. Two hours after the meal, the glucose level should be less than 155 mg/dL.", "answer_choice": "D. 92, 180, 155"}
